name: Splash It! (Loann Courcoul, Samuel Barbeau, Tiimot)
name_original: Splash It! (Loann Courcoul, Samuel Barbeau, Tiimot)
description:
This project was made in 6 week for our school 1st years final project.

Splash it is a local multiplayer game for 2 to 4 player's, when you incarnate a cartoon character in a fade world, your goal is to paint the world with the must of your colors and try to prevent other players from repainting the world.

The game was made cooperatively with a another game artists class and  some music artists,  we thank them for their graph/sounds and their participation in the project.

Music artists : On FL STUDIO Clément, Dylan Mc Lelland, Quentin Boulay, Jack Jones

Devs : Loann Courcoul / Tiimot / Samuel Barbeau
CONTROLS :
KEYBOARD
GAMEPADMOVE“ZQSD”, “AWSD” or ArrowsLeftAnalog or D-Pad and Right TriggerSHOOT
Shift, Numpad 6 or Left Button on Mouse
Right Shoulder or Button West
DRIFTSpace or Numpad 4
Button South or Left Shoulder
